help-file.title: ASSASSIN
help-file.content:
Assassins are practitioners of death and stealth, always lurking down dark alleys and just around the corner, ready to commit a convenient act of murder if it suits them. Assassins are adept at the art of concealment and deception, but they are not as skilled at the art of stealth as other related classes might be. Assassins are by far the most deadly creatures around if they catch you by surprise and happen to be carrying their favorite daggers with them.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th: Spinal Tap 40th: Apply Poison 45th: Control Flee 51st: Critical Stab
